message: Halabi and a group of other GPS graduate students teamed up to host the second annual Intercollegiate Convention Against Modern Slavery at UC San Diego. The conference with student leaders across the nation took place March 2 to 4, where they convened to discuss what is currently being done and what can be done to fight modern slavery.

data.description: Although slavery is commonly thought to be a thing of the past, human traffickers generate billions of dollars in profits from holding millions of people against their will throughout the world, including the United States. data.title: Student Changemakers Fight Human Trafficking
